name: invert-theme-bookmarklet
description: Dynamic Bookmarklet to invert the colors of a website

scripts.minify:wrap: cat src/invertThemeBookmarklet.min.js | wrap 'javascript:!(()=>{' '})();' > tmpfile && cat tmpfile > src/invertThemeBookmarklet.min.js && rm tmpfile
scripts.minify: yarn run minify:compile && yarn run minify:wrap
scripts.build: yarn run compile && yarn run lint && yarn autoclean

author: Tom Lutzenberger
